description:
Perfectly positioned and presented
This beautifully presented home is perfectly located in the heart of Cowes just a short stroll to the Cowes foreshore and local restaurants, boutique shops and all amenities.
The lower level features the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, sunny open plan living and dining area and modern, well appointed kitchen with the added convenience of a powder room. The upper level consists of two further bedrooms, second bathroom with spa bath, study nook and access to the private covered balcony. Additional features include large double garage and split system heating and cooling.
If you are looking for permanent living, this home is offered fully furnished with nothing to do but move in and enjoy this low maintenance lifestyle. Alternatively, it would make an ideal investment or holiday getaway for all the family.

Modern, low maintenance living
This modern four bedroom home has everything you need to enjoy your summer holidays, including fantastic bay views from the rooftop deck.
The ground floor features a large kitchen with plenty of cupboard space, dishwasher, gas cooktop, oven and an island bench, dining area that opens onto an undercover deck as well as a sunroom/ BBQ area at the rear of the property. The living area has a feature gas log fireplace made from local San Remo pier timber and is highly efficient. The large master bedroom has an ensuite including spa bath, separate shower as well as a walk in robe, and there is a second bathroom with separate toilet and laundry.
The second storey comprises of two bedrooms, each with ceiling fans and built in robes which are serviced by a central bathroom with double vanities and separate shower. The roof top deck is accessed from this area which takes in the stunning views, an ideal location for entertaining and relaxation.
The third storey of the home features a loft bedroom, ideal for a kids retreat, featuring two loft windows that take in the fantastic views. Heating and cooling is provided by split system air conditioners in each bedroom, living area and loft.
Other features include a two car remote lock up garage with lots of storage, and an additional two off street car spaces, ideal for extra cars, boat or caravan, and small low maintenance yard.
Call today to arrange your inspection.

Central Cowes - modern and stylish
Larger than it appears, this fabulous, stylish home is situated approximately 1km from town central, located near a park with childrens play equipment and the local watering hole RSL is just around the corner.
Brick render and a tiled roof, built for longevity. Single level with four spacious bedrooms, master with walk in robe and full ensuite, two living areas (one currently utilised as an office/lounge), large open kitchen/dining with all of the modern conveniences.
The undercover alfresco area to the rear of the property is perfect for outdoor entertaining. Double lock up garage has internal access to the house and an extra gate running down the side of the house will be great storage for the boat or caravan.
A low maintenance garden is the retiree, or busy parents must.
Ducted reverse cycle air conditioning, ducted vacuuming systems, a new hot water service and down lights throughout are extra features which make this property very attractive.

A Statement of Style!
In this exclusive location between the Cowes Golf Club, main shopping complex and only a short stroll to the pristine North facing Silverleaves Beach is this stylish four bedroom and two-bathroom residence.
Forming the hub of the home is the modern open plan living, kitchen and dining area. The well-appointed kitchen is complete with an Island stone benchtop, double pantry, stainless steel appliances including gas cook top, electric oven and a two-draw dishwasher.
The living area is flooded with an abundance of natural light and is complemented with a stunning raked ceiling and bamboo floating floors. This space is maximized by stacking doors that flow effortlessly onto the private outdoor entertainment area. Offering a perfect place to entertain family and friends.
The master bedroom incorporates an en-suite and walk-in-robe with access to the outdoor entertainment area, the three robed bedrooms are situated further along the hallway with a central contemporary bathroom and separate toilet.
Other features include a separate laundry, double glazed windows, 2x split-system heating and cooling units and ceiling fans throughout. There is also a garden shed, double garage and side access (on both sides, with room for a small boat or trailer)
This beautifully finished, architecturally designed home is set within a fully fenced 659sqm (approx.) allotment, completed by a low maintenance, stoned yard running alongside the residence, with direct reserve and walking path access.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Stroll to the bay and cafes
Located on a large corner allotment of approx. 819sqm with a North facing aspect and only minutes walking distance to central Cowes, this quality built home awaits you.
This home offers main bedroom with spacious walk in robe & ensuite, 3 further bedrooms two with built in robes and a naturally light central bathroom and laundry with access to the backyard. Further there is a large family room with double sliding doors out to the back garden and sliding doors to the north facing alfresco area. The central kitchen is functional with access to both the family room and dining room with second living area separated by a stunning feature open fire place.
Additional features of the property include central heating & cooling throughout, large double lock up garage with outside access. The property has corner access with endless potential.
What makes this property so special is it's direct access down a sandy path to the family friendly north facing Cowes beach.

PRESENTATION PERFECT
Located in the popular Whytesands Estate, this stylish home has it all. From its modern fa√ßade through to the functional and well thought out floorplan, 18 Pasadena Drive is sure to tick all the boxes.
The spacious home offers 3 generous sized bedrooms, master with full ensuite and walk in robe and double built in robes to the remaining bedrooms.
Tailored for comfortable living, the separate dining/rumpus and open plan kitchen/living area ensures everyone has their own space.
The expansive and modern open plan kitchen comes complete with huge island bench, dishwasher, 900ml oven and cooktop together with walk in pantry offering more bench space and cupboard storage.
Set on a fully enclosed private and spacious 540sqm (approx.) block there is plenty of room for the kids to play and covered alfresco area has your entertaining needs taken care of.
Other features of this property include polished concrete flooring, walk in linen, ducted heating, double lock up garage with internal access, together with side gate access through to the rear yard for you to store the caravan, trailer or boat.
Perfectly maintained and presented all you have to do is move in and enjoy everything this home and the surrounds have to offer.
Do not miss out on your chance to secure 18 Pasadena Drive, Cowes - call Amber Gehling today to arrange your inspection.

Coastal Contemporary Charm
Only minutes walk to the beach and Cowes boat ramp, this townhouse (1 of 4) is perfectly located at the rear where privacy will not be a problem. Designed to suit every demographic with a master bedroom located downstairs, including ensuite and walk in robe and a spacious open plan kitchen and living area.
Walk through to the low maintenance outdoor living and fully fenced back yard perfect for the family and pets. Upstairs includes two comfortable bedrooms, one modern bathroom and a second living area ideal for accommodating friends and family.Additional features include a double remote controlled garage, downstairs powder room, 2.5 kilowatt solar panels, reverse cycle heating and cooling both upstairs and down and beautiful natural light and bright living areas.

Position, privacy and space
Behind this contemporary exterior lies a generously proportioned and beautifully renovated home.
Featuring three bedrooms, all generously sized. The master bedroom features a walk in robe and full ensuite, complete with glass shower and sliding door into the ensuite.The house has bamboo flooring throughout and two large living zones. The kitchen features quartz bench tops and double island benches. Large 950 gas cooktop, deep double sink, drawer dishwasher and walk in pantry.
There are provisions for a plumbed fridge. Standing in the kitchen, you look out over a beautiful bamboo decking area through to the reserve at the rear of the property.
The decking is covered by an electric awning that spans the width and length of the deck.
At the rear of the house is a fully self contained bungalow, with full bathroom and kitchenette. The garage has an electric door and parking for 4 cars. There is additional shedding at the rear of the property, perfect for the man cave.
The house is wired with smart switches throughout and has the ability to cast a wifi network across the entire property. Located centrally in Cowes means you can walk to all that the main hub of Phillip Island has to offer. The home backs onto council reserve and is a dog friendly park.
Inspections are sure to impress.

LOW MAINTENANCE LIVING, READY TO MOVE INTO
Located in an exclusive cul-de-sac, at the quiet end of Church Street, only a short 350m stroll to a very private beach and also 350m to the nature walk leading to Red Rocks Beach.
This near new townhouse is perfect for those who want to escape the rat race and spend quiet leisurely time beachside and, if the need for shopping arises, only 5 min to the Cowes main street by car.
Set over two levels, this stunning townhouse is superbly appointed, with quality furnishings. The upstairs area consists of the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite with walk in shower & spa, and a beautiful open plan kitchen, dining and living area, with split system air conditioning offering year round comfort. The fully equipped kitchen, includes large walk in pantry, 900mm stainless steel electric oven with gas cooktop, and stainless steel dishwasher. The island bench offers convenient, relaxed dining. The dining area leads to the living area and then out to a covered balcony.
Downstairs there are 2 bright and airy bedrooms with built in robes, both serviced by an impressive main bathroom with bath plus separate powder room. The laundry is conveniently located in the single garage which has direct access into the townhouse, as well as access to a generous rear courtyard with low maintenance landscaped gardens.
A bonus is the ample storage- a lock up shed in the rear yard, lock up storage under the staircase, and large linen cupboard.
Being offered fully furnished, this townhouse is ready and waiting for you to move straight in.

Low maintenance living
This three-bedroom home is located in the prestigious Seagrove estate, just 800 metres from Thompson Avenue in Cowes. The home is close to the beach, shops, restaurants and cafes with a new park under construction just 50 metres away.
Beyond this, walking and cycle paths will connect you to Seagrove's more than eight acres of landscaped open space. The home features a master bedroom with a walk through robe to a semi ensuite, a further two bedrooms have carpeted floors and built in robes, large kitchen with dishwasher drawer, electric oven, cooktop and plenty of storage, open plan living dining area with access to a sunny entertaining deck, as well as a separate second living area, laundry with powder room and access to a single garage with remote control door.
Other features include ducted, reverse-cycle air-conditioning, non slip flooring in wet areas, landscaped garden and fully fenced yard. Call today to arrange your inspection.

TITLED LAND READY TO BUILD
Here we have on offer an allotment facing East West perfect for that northern sun filled home.
This allotment offers all available services connected such as NBN, underground power, sewage, mains water & recycled water.
At 512m2 and a frontage of 16m with completed cross over all you have to worry about is building your dream home.
Call Alex Scott today to discuss this allotment on 5952 2633

EASY LIVING MOVE IN READY
Tucked away in a quiet location within Cowes you will find the near new low maintenance home ready to move straight into with nothing left to do.
Approximately 313m2, the allotment is fully landscaped and fenced with possible side access great for storing that boat caravan or trailer.
This new 3 bedroom home has been constructed by one of Gippsland's leading and most reputable builders. As you walk into this home you will instantly feel the owner spent the time designing this home to create a beautiful place to live with open plan living in mind.
The spacious master bedroom is designed with a full walk in wardrobe and ensuite. The additional 2 large bedrooms gives you plenty of room for your family and friends.
The open plan living kitchen & dining is designed to be central to truly make this home easy living.
All of this opening onto the rear entertaining area a ideal place to relax and take in the quiet life here in Saraghi Place.
Call Alex Scott and Staff today on 5952 2633 to arrange your inspection.

TITLED AND READY TO BUILD ON
Build your dream home in this family friendly estate. Located in the Whytesands Estate about 1.5 k's from the beach and only a few minutes' walk to the local park that has a covered BBQ pavilion, footy goals, basketball court, soccer net and Flying fox.
This flat block is located directly across from reserve land that features a great walking path, around the Estate as well as giving access to the nearby beach and the town centre of Cowes.
Other block details are as listed...
-Total width 14.7 meters
-Total area approx.. 552 m2
-No easements!
-NBN available
-Mains Water available
-Class A recycled water available
-Sewage connection available
-Electrical connection available
-All underground services

A truly outstanding family residence!
Situated at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac, this tri level family home is designed for those who are looking to enjoy the Island lifestyle.
This immaculately presented residence comprises of a spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area upstairs which flows effortlessly out to the undercover entertainment area that is partially enclosed- a lovely spot to enjoy a BBQ or to entertain your guests.
The middle level offers four robed bedrooms and two bathrooms; the master is complete with a walk-in robe and ensuite.
Downstairs contains a separate second living area and bar which has internal access to the large 9m x 6m garage that is attached to the home.
With a host of additional features including split system heating and cooling, electric log fire, nobo heating, stainless steel appliances to the kitchen, cathedral ceilings to the main living space, solar panels and water tank. A huge 9m x 7m shed is situated in the rear yard and offers plenty of accommodation for boats/caravan/trailers or could potentially be utilized for a home business or converted into a self-contained area.
All of this is set within a 1,103sqm approx. fully fenced allotment with lush and established low maintenance surrounds and approximately a 1km walk along the adjacent access track to the beach.
Offering scope to add your own touch, this home will not disappoint.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Single Level Splendour
Surrounded by quality homes in the environmentally-sensitive coastal living Seagrove Estate is this light filled home on a low maintenance 311sqm (approx) allotment offering the perfect opportunity for investment, permanent living solution or holiday home.
The modern home comprises of three spacious bedrooms with built in robes including the master bedroom a with dual access ensuite and a separate toilet catering to the whole family. You'll enjoy a bright open plan kitchen/dining/living zone which flows out to a private rear yard. The kitchen itself features stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, gas cook top and under bench oven. You'll be ready for all four seasons with split system heating and cooling as well as gas ducted heating throughout.
Additional features include a double garage with internal access, solar hot water, large water tank and a storage shed in the rear yard. Live the island life just a short walk from the family friendly north facing Cowes foreshore and shopping district.
This property for Sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

High Yield Rental Apartment In Brilliant Location!
Come and go as you please with this brilliantly located two bedroom apartment in the heart of Cowes, just steps to the picturesque north facing bay beach, shops, restaurants and cafes. This delightful, contemporary styled and spacious ground floor apartment is perfect for buyers looking for a low maintenance permanent residence, fabulous holiday retreat for your own use or earn a substantial income from the lucrative holiday rental market. Currently an approximate 7.5% return on investment.
The light filled apartment boasts a comfortable carpeted lounge area with access from here to a lovely undercover alfresco area complete with water glimpses. Both bedrooms are a good size and include built in robes whilst the bathroom combined laundry features a vanity, bath, separate shower and toilet. The kitchen and dining area completes this fabulous apartment for a low maintenance lock up and go lifestyle or excellent holiday rental.
Other great features include one undercover car park space plus an additional space directly at the front of the unit, gorgeous white plantation shutters throughout, split system heating and cooling, wall panel heater
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

TITLED ALLOTMENT READY TO BUILD
This allotment is located in the beautiful Shoalhaven Estate. Situated in one of the most sought-after locations on Phillip Island, Shoalhaven is less than 700 metres from the renowned Red Rocks beach and a short 4-minute drive into the thriving town centre of Cowes.
This 400m2 sized allotment with a 13.5m frontage is located on a corner, ideal for rear access on the side of the allotment.
Located across from the large park complete with play equipment ideal for the family.
Call Alex Scott Cowes today on 5952 2633 to discuss purchasing this allotment and building your home.

Emphasis On Family Living and Lifestyle
In this tightly held area of Cowes is a unique family home within walking distance to all Cowes has to offer. Pristine north facing beach's, fabulous cafes and shops on Thompson Ave, a short drive from some of the best Surf Beaches in Victoria, and a short walk to two great local primary schools.
This home is a classic Beach House Construction design and build, featuring 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 living areas (one of the living areas could easily convert to a 4th bedroom) with great outdoor entertaining and ample parking space with double garage and extra parking for cars and boats making the most of the corner block.
The design has put full emphasis on family living/lifestyle while taking advantage of light and space. Only the highest standard of construction has been used including quality fittings and fixtures throughout.
As you weave through the landscaped garden to the front door, you are invited into the first of two living areas, with central open plan kitchen, meals family living areas, with vaulted pitch ceiling, wood heater and split system, polished hardwood flooring and large windows overlooking the decked alfresco area and low maintenance garden. Walk through to the kid's wing of the house with the further 2 bedrooms, family bathroom, laundry and second living area. The master bedroom and ensuite create the Parents wing of the home giving them space and distance from the rest of the house.
This magnificent home is a great investment or a fantastic permanent family home or holiday getaway.
An inspection is a must as this house will not disappoint. Call now for a private inspection.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

When Location Counts
Situated approx 100 metres to the waters edge on the beautiful north facing Cowes beach is this excellent.
1241sqm approx prime Phillip Island land, with a 3 bed 2 bath family home.
Opportunities to purchase house in such a fantastic location are rare so make the most of this wonderful offering and call our office today!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Superior location
Without doubt, this property boasts one of Cowes most coveted positions merely metres from Cowes sandy, foreshore beach. Located on a generous 850m2 (approx.) parcel of land, this property offers a secluded haven in natural coastal surrounds.
Spread over two levels, the lower level features a large, family lounge with hardwood floors, kitchen and dining, bathroom and laundry. With access to the undercover entertainment area and overlooking the leafy surrounds you will be immediately charmed.The upper level features a family bathroom and three spacious bedrooms, two of which have balconies to further enjoy the surrounds this home offers.
Sitting on approx. 850sqm on land, this property is sure to impress! Whether you want to enjoy as a holiday home that oozes character, charm and privacy or develop this site, you cannot go wrong.
This much sought after location, so close to the foreshore and centre of Cowes offers an enviable lifestyle, idyllic holiday getaway or superb development site (STCA).Properties in this area are very tightly held so act quickly to secure this wonderful opportunity.

More Than The Eye Can See...
You will be amazed by what this Cowes unit has to offer!
This recently renovated 3 bedroom unit, has been stylishly transformed to provide a bright contemporary space. With a neutral colour palette, and practical floor plan - it is ready for the new owner to move in.
The unit offers open plan living, kitchen and dining areas, 3 generous sized bedrooms all with built in robes, serviced by a family bathroom and separate laundry.
At the front of the complex, there is common ground including ample car parking and an outdoor entertaining area. The unit also offers a private low maintenance courtyard at the rear.
Also featuring:-
Split system heating/cooling
Dishwasher (new)
Electric Hot Water System (new)
There is no body corporate in place, the only expense is public liability insurance for the common space at the front of the complex.
Situated close to Thompson Avenue, and walking distance to the beach, this property would be an ideal addition to your investment portfolio, or for holiday or permanent living.
You must see this property for yourself - inspection will not disappoint!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
